original: Do you like hurting other people? Absolutely. Every kill energizes you, boosting your HP by +50, even beyond your maximum. It decreases back to normal over time as the bloodlust subsides. (Requires Neutral / Evil Karma)
translation: 你喜欢伤害别人吗？当然。每次击杀都会使你振奋，从而+50生命值，该效果可以超过生命值上限。随着嗜血消退，生命值也会随着时间推移减少到之前的水平。（需要中性/邪恶业力）

original: All animals are great, but Dogs are great-er. With this perk, Dogs and other Canines will never attack you, can be tamed to temporarily follow you, and will be much tougher in combat.
translation: 所有的动物都很棒，但狗更棒一些。有了这个特长，狗和其他犬科动物永远不会攻击你。你可以驯服它们、使其暂时跟随你，驯服的狗在战斗中将获得额外加强。

original: Like the mythical "McClane" of legend, you don't give up easily! With this perk, when your Hit Points get below 20% you get an additional 10% to Damage Resistance.
translation: 就像神话般的传奇"麦克莱恩"一样，你不会轻易放弃！有了这个特长，当你的生命值低于20％时，你会获得额外的10％伤害抗性。

original: You're such a shrewd salesman, the aura of your wealth can now be sensed by all. Every 1000 caps carried will now add +1 to your Barter skill, up to a maximum of 20.
translation: 你是一个精明的推销员，人们简直能看到你身上财富的光环。每携带1000个瓶盖将+1交易技能，最多+20。

original: By discovering your inner feline, you've learned how to contort your body to maximize air-resistance and almost entirely eliminate the risk of hurting yourself during a fall. You now no longer take any fall damage.
translation: 通过发现你的猫性内在，你已经学会了如何扭转你的身体，以最大限度地提高空气阻力，几乎完全消除跌落时伤到自己的风险。你现在不再受到任何坠落伤害。

original: Every kill made up-close with a Melee weapon fuels you, making you hit harder and faster. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and fades over time.
translation: 你用近战武器制造的每一起杀戮都能让自己更加狂暴，从而攻击得更狠、更快。该效果最多可以叠加10层，并随着时间的推移而消失。

original: Even the NCR's First Recon Sharpshooters would have trouble keeping up with your keen senses. With this perk, V.A.T.S. hit-chance decreases significantly slower over range.
translation: 即使是NCR第一侦察营的神枪手也很难跟上你敏锐的感官。有了这个特长，V.A.T.S.的远距离命中率惩罚显著降低了。

original: They can rebuild you! Usanagi has the technology! All Energy Weapons have +25% Attack Speed, and you can move faster while aiming with them. (Requires at least 1 Implant)
translation: 他们可以重建你！宇佐木有科技！所有能量武器+25％攻击速度，且你可以在瞄准时移动得更快。（需要至少1个植入物）

original: Years of experience hackin' and whackin' have taught you how to slice through meat with ease. All limb damage with blades is increased by 50%, and each crippled limb inflicted will temporarily raise your critical chance.
translation: 多年的经验教你如何轻松地切开肉。使用刀具时造成肢体伤害增加50%，每造成一个残肢将暂时提高你的暴击几率。

original: Fighting under the scorching sun has given you an appreciation for whatever food you canfind. Consuming food will give an increase to Carry Weight, Perception, and Speed. The longer since you've eaten, the bigger the gains.
translation: 在烈日下的战斗给了你对任何你能买到的食物的感激之情。消耗食品会提高携带重量，感知和速度。吃得越多，收获就越大。

original: You're quick as a whip, and bullets seem to bounce right off you. With this perk, 10% of your current movement speed is added on to your Damage Resistance. Keep moving, and find ways to go faster to maximize this effect!
translation: 你快得像鞭，子弹似乎从你身上弹开了。有了这个特长。你移动速度的10%会同等加成到伤害抗性上。继续前进，并想方设法走得更快，以最大限度地发挥这种效果！

original: They can rebuild you! Usanagi has the technology! All Energy Weapons have +25% Attack Speed, and you can move faster while aiming with them. (Requires at least 1 Implant)
translation: 他们可以重建你！宇佐木有科技！所有能量武器+25％攻击速度，且你可以在瞄准时移动得更快。（需要至少1个植入物）
